The fanfic end is they confront each other and Gen brings up how she was raped and the Ninja world was messed up. Two ends: They fight and he wins, killing the child in the process(accident or otherwise), and with her “task” and purpose gone, the weight of what happened hits her, and Gen decides the Ninja world must know Pain and shinra tensei’s everything before finding himself a loyal woman(could be her, could be a kunoichi or normal person entirely). The second, bleaker ending, he lets her kill him and she realizes he was never a traitor, or he was, but either way it actually breaks her, as she was too cowardly to run away with him once she caught up. These realizations have her name her kid Gen, and she grows up to be a super mother con and incest comes into play as the boy becomes the next MC

This whole anthology has been garbage and like I said before it's a real shame 'cause Sena made much better works in the past, the only story I've liked so far the mother-daughter one, yet it ended too soon and felt extremely rushed, despite having a much more interesting story than the other two.
